builder.name: R. and J. Prior and Son Ltd.

boat.full_description: Saoirse was found in an abandoned state at Carne Creek near the Helford River and restored over 18 months by her current owner who says she sails beautifully.   She was however dismasted in the 2024 Falmouth Classics. Over the next months she was fitted with a new mast and new deck. Also new sails.
boat.name: Saoirse
boat.short_description: Saoirse is a Harrison Buttler Bogle Class
